author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-415. rb: BinaryProtocolAccelerated does not behave properly when strict reads are turned off
This patch adds the appropriate test for the behavior and fixes the thrift_native project to do the right thing.

msg: Correctly unexport all RMI objects so the JVM exits gracefully when the appserver is shutdown
